quote: 'Today, we will demonstrate our utter mastery over this planet; for better or for worse.' - Kim Kwan Seol, terraforming project lead

civilopediaText.text: A massive, simultaneous undertaking to turn this alien planet into one that resembles Old Earth.
This facility is where specialized aerosols are produced and released into the atmosphere, in order to make the air more breathable to humans.
Deep rods extend downwards to stabilize the local tectonic plates.

name: Soil Revitalizer
uniques: [+1 Food] from [Agri Farm] tiles [in this city]

civilopediaText.text: Procedures, microbes and chemicals developed and applied in order to return nutrients to the soil.

name: Oceanic Purifier
uniques: [+1 Food] from [Water resource] tiles [in this city]

civilopediaText.text: Massive floating facilities that roam the seas as they filter out toxins from the water and introduce oxygen to depleted waters.
